comments: Monsieur Raymond-Hamet was used in J. Bot. 1916 and Bol. Soc. Brot., 24 (1950) and 37 (1963).  In Bull. Soc. Bot. France he published as R.Hamet.
examples: Drosera neocaledonica Raym.-Hamet in Bull. Soc. Bot. France 53: 151. 1906. Kalanchoe fernandesii Raym.-Hamet in Bol. Soc. Brot. s√©r. 2, 24: 107, 112. 1950
